params.module: The address of the new module. It needs to be authorized in LaserRegistry.

params.laserRegistry: Address of LaserRegistry: contract that contains the addresses                              of authorized modules.
params.smartSocialRecovery: Address of Laser smart social recovery module.

returns._0: The guard modules that belong to the requested address.

params.module: The address of the module to remove.
params.prevModule: The address of the previous module on the linked list.

params.gasLimit: Maximum amount of gas the owner is willing to use for this transaction.
params.maxFeePerGas: Maximum WEI the owner is willing to pay per unit of gas.
params.signatures: The signature(s) of the hash of this transaction.
params.wallet: The address of the wallet: should be 'msg.sender'.

addGuardModule(address).notice: Adds a new guard module.         wallet is 'msg.sender'.

removeGuardModule(address,address,bytes).notice: Removes a guard module. wallet is 'msg.sender'.

verifyTransaction(address,address,uint25.notice: Verifies a Laser transaction.         It calls all guard sub-modules with the 'verifyTransaction api'.         Each sub-module implements its own logic. But the main purpose is to         provide extra transaction security.

userdoc.notice: Parent guard module that calls child Laser guards.
